sql_time_pattern: WHERE datetime([time_column1],'start of year') = datetime([time_column2],'start of year')
WHERE datetime([time_column2]) BETWEEN datetime([time_column1]) AND datetime([time_column1],'+{year} year')
WHERE datetime([time_column1],'start of month') = datetime([time_column2],'start of month')
WHERE datetime([time_column2]) BETWEEN datetime([time_column1]) AND datetime([time_column1],'+{month} month')
WHERE datetime([time_column1],'start of day') = datetime([time_column2],'start of day')
WHERE datetime([time_column2]) BETWEEN datetime([time_column1]) AND datetime([time_column1],'+{day} day')
